name: C5 Nerve Root Injury Recovery Plan
goal: Restore biceps function and upper limb strength through progressive rehabilitation and neurostimulation.

exercises.name: Deltoid Activation with e-stim
exercises.description: Electrical stimulation applied to deltoid to trigger muscle contraction.
exercises.instructions: Apply electrodes over deltoid; stimulate for 10 minutes at comfortable intensity.

exercises.name: Supine PROM Shoulder Flexion
exercises.description: Passive Range of Motion performed with assistance while lying supine.
exercises.instructions: Therapist-assisted elevation of arm to full available range without resistance.

exercises.name: Passive Arm Bike
exercises.description: Motor-assisted cycling for shoulder/elbow movement stimulation.
exercises.instructions: Arm positioned in bike support; cycle passively for 15 minutes.
